heading: Today
text: ***FROST AND FREEZE ADVISORIES NORTH, OUTSIDE THE CHAMPLAIN VALLEY, TONIGHT AND EARLY SATURDAY ***Morning clouds giving way to increasing sunshine.  A bit breezy, and much cooler.  Highs in the low to mid 60s north, and 70 to 75 south.  Winds north to northwest near 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Becoming clear and chilly.  Areas of fog and patches of frost possible.  Lows in the 30s to near 40, near 30 in the cold spots.  Winds north to northwest near 10 mph, becoming light in sheltered valleys.

heading: Saturday
text: Mostly sunny and cool.  Highs in the upper 50s to mid 60s north, 65 to 70 in the south.  Winds light, mainly northwest 5 to 10 mph.
